item.title: anxious about digital footprint and privacy
item.description: Syncing, backups and what OneDrive Security: How Safe Are Your Files in 2022 (cloudwards.net) how safe is OneDrive should I encrypt all my files?

item.title: how do I ensure my devices are synced
item.description: What I’m looking for not costly (I really want to try Obsidian Sync but I’m not sure if it’s worth it) can sync with iPhone and iPad can sync with other Windows devices sync plugins as well make use of my OneDrive Personal storage/subscription encryption Options Syncthing usage is only free up to 20MB Remotely-save open source and free can be used with iPhone and iPad caveat: will be using the phone/iPad’s storage plugins are not synced (not sure if this is possible since sync with _ is available, but since I’m using git too I didn’t want to sync that as well) makes use of OneDrive Personal encrypted, but I personally used another OneDrive account rather than granting the plugin access to my personal one.

item.title: How to publish your notes online
item.description: What I want little to no cost (Obsidian Publish is great but costly ðŸ˜¥) with graph view easy to deploy using GitHub Pages how much should you publish online The only way to learn in public is to build in public â€¢ Mental Nodes For inspiration: About â€¢ Mental Nodes This is using this kmcgillivray/obsidian-lettersmith: Transform any Obsidian vault (or any folder of markdown files) into a backlink-powered static website using Lettersmith.

item.title: How to write notes properly
item.description: Is there a correct way of writing notes? Like everyone who wanted some sort of workflow in the way they take down notes, I became obsessed with PKMs and Obsidian.

item.title: see what questions to ask
item.description: what’s missing? can i add something to it? combine something? how does this fit to things i already know can i use other words or terms to explain this properly how can i use this to explain another idea when would i need this note again will i publish this online?

item.title: Setting up Quartz
item.description: related: rabbit hole of searching for something and ending up tinkering on something else also: i don’t know a lot about linux

item.title: Setup Online Digital Garden
item.description: workflow for publishing digital garden From: Publishing your Obsidian Vault Online with Quartz (brandonkboswell.com) Open all needed tools Debian Terminal 2022-11-05 : integrated to VSCode using “Workspace Terminals” Extension VSCode Obsidian vault Debian Terminal opens in quartz directory right away 2022-11-05: Using Workspace Terminals to follow path Make changes to your public notes or any config file For one-time compilation: Run .
